title: Summer Break Schedule
content: Summer break will commence from July 20th to August 15th. All students are advised to complete their assignments before the break.
author: Principal

title: Parent-Teacher Meeting
content: Parent-teacher meetings are scheduled for July 12th and 13th. Please contact your class teacher to book an appointment.
author: Academic Coordinator

title: Science Fair Registration
content: Registration for the annual science fair is now open. Interested students can register with their science teachers by July 10th.
author: Science Department

title: Library Book Return Reminder
content: All students are reminded to return borrowed books before July 15th. Late fees will be applicable for overdue books.
author: Librarian

title: Sports Day Postponed
content: Due to weather conditions, Sports Day has been postponed to July 22nd. Further updates will be communicated soon.
author: Sports Department

title: New Computer Lab Inauguration
content: We are pleased to announce the inauguration of our new computer lab on July 8th at 10:00 AM. All students and staff are invited.
author: IT Department
